TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mudan, title = Mudan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mudan} }

S.FORM: Mudan Mudan gu icuwa i Pingtung. ala atjunangn mapuljat 173.85 km (ma'linpan atjunang 78.01 km , ma'linaule atjunang 67.38 km ). ala caucau mapuljat 4,619 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 1,806 a daceneqlan, Puyuma, Amis (93 ) a maqcuwa caucau. mudan aicu a mudan(penaywanan: sinvaudjan)i pasakacedas a navalj tua qakaw tua taiwan, nakidekes tua sisigu, daren i taitu, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a , a i pasanavalj izua a sevangecul, mavan a guciu a tjaljanavalj a gadu a kacalisiyan. azua a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan "nu 1878 a cavilj a imaza a guciu. nu 1920 a cavilj, aicu a mudan a pinaljavak na sihu nua ripun tua .qaw, nu paljavak a sihu nua chuguku ta taiwan a imaza, teveljen aza qinaljan imaza, saka masan ta aicu a guciu. aicu a mudan i , a nakitangez ta gadu i cadja, kinamamamawan tua vavavan nua gadu a mavan a nekanga a kuzulj a vavavan a maru tadjekuacan. izuazua a pana a ,pana a ,pana a . izuazua a amizuku uta. paljavak tua atjunang matja 6 qinaljan i Mudan. matja 8 qinaljan imaza, Maljipa, Sinevaudjan, Macaran( ), Kus kus, Pungudan, Kapanan, Anteng, Draki. likisi aicu a mudan nua sinvaudjan kata kuskus kasicuayan. nu 1874 a cavilj, kiqeci a siha na ripun ta taiwan, masa qineci ta ripun a cawcaw na kacalisiyan nu 1871 a cavilj. aicu a mavan a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan". qaw, sinanpazangal taimaza na sihu a . venaday taimza na sihu nua ripun: tjaqaciljai tucu a mudan a , , , . Sinvaudjan tucu a mudan a , , , . Kuskus tuca a mudan a . Macaren tucu a mudan a . Padriyiur tucu a padriyiur bunsili,ljaviyaviya. tucu a mudan a , . aicu a unem a qinaljan, pinaljavak tua nu 1920 a cavilj, qaw neka a .sa pungadan a " ". nu pakavilji a masanmusalj a makaqeci sekacawan, masa a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan" kata liaw a raculju imaza, sa pungadan a taimaza. nu 1950 a cavilj, pinaljavak na qakaw. sa venaday a ta nu 1956 a cavilj. ka 1969 a cavilj, pinaljavak a na tucu. sepaljavak mavaday a Aicu a guciu tua unem a mula: :(tjaqaciljai ): , , , . (sinvaudjan ): , , (macaren ) (kuskus ) tatuluan izua tjelu a gakku a kedrikedri imaza i sinvaudjan(mudan gu). kivangavangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 26 a palidring a djalan na taiwan palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199 A a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 156 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 172 a palidring a djalan na qakaw
